Html:
Hey all-

I threw together a proof of concept knockoutjs debugger called knockthrough.

I wrote it in Typescript.
  • Logs property changes
  • Displays binding errors, with a dump
  • Model dumps for all bound models
  • Display hidden elements with their expression and datacontext
Demo here: http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/JonKragh/knockthrough/blob/master/default.htm

And repo here: https://github.com/JonKragh/knockthrough

Loving Typescript!
Jon
